Text:
Strewth!!
thanks very much for this. this bloke has written some fabulous tunes.
Made my day to see this on PB. You wouldn't believe how many times I've searched this site for his music over the years.

Omg. I think I love you in a distant, twisted way. Anyway... I had a song by Mr. Bogle that I had received from a p2p-program years ago which was titled "Where Stands Scotland Now?"

After numerous searches on the internet and no results I begin to wonder whether it's actually his song (or I would, if the song didn't contain allusions to Peebles, Scotland, and Australia), does anyone know the real title of that song (I assume it must exist but under another name)?
(If I can get this piece of information, if so from Bogle himself, I promise to instantly order all of his work).
i'm not an eric bogle fan myself. this upload was mainly at the request of a fellow TPB mod (Tob) who requested his music, so i uploaded it.
